aria-disabled.description: Indicates if the button is disabled for accessibility purposes.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the button for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.description: Button that can be styled in various ways
BasicComponents.name: IonButton

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the card for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.description: Card that can contain various content
BasicComponents.name: IonCard

aria-checked.description: Indicates the current checked state of the checkbox.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the checkbox for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the content container for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.description: Main content container of the application
BasicComponents.name: IonContent

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the datetime picker for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the floating action button for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the icon for accessibility purposes.

alt.description: Alternative text for the image, providing context when the image cannot be displayed.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the image for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the input field for accessibility purposes.

aria-required.description: Indicates whether the input field is required.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the item for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the text for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the list for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the loading spinner for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the menu for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the modal for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the progress bar for accessibility purposes.

aria-valuemax.description: Defines the maximum value of the progress bar.

aria-valuemin.description: Defines the minimum value of the progress bar.

aria-valuenow.description: Defines the current value of the progress bar.

validationRules.aria-valuenow: must be a number between 0 and 100

aria-checked.description: Indicates if the radio button is checked.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the radio button for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the range slider for accessibility purposes.

aria-valuemax.description: Defines the maximum value of the range slider.

aria-valuemin.description: Defines the minimum value of the range slider.

aria-valuenow.description: Defines the current value of the range slider.

validationRules.aria-valuenow: must be a number between aria-valuemin and aria-valuemax

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the refresher for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the search input for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the segment control for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the select dropdown for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the skeleton text for accessibility purposes.
Defines a string value that labels the toast for accessibility purposes.

aria-checked.description: Indicates if the toggle switch is checked.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the toggle switch for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonActionSheet
BasicComponents.description: Action sheet for presenting a set of options to the user.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the action sheet for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonAlert
BasicComponents.description: Alert dialog for showing important messages.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the alert for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonBackdrop
BasicComponents.description: Backdrop component for creating visual effects in modals and other views.

aria-hidden.description: Indicates whether the backdrop is visible or not.

validationRules.aria-hidden: must be a boolean string ('true' or 'false')

BasicComponents.name: IonBadge
BasicComponents.description: Badge component for showing small notifications or status indicators.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the badge for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonButtons
BasicComponents.description: Group of buttons for creating different types of button groups.

BasicComponents.name: IonPicker
BasicComponents.description: Picker component for selecting options from a list.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the picker for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonPopover
BasicComponents.description: Popover component for displaying floating content above other elements.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the popover for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonRadioGroup
BasicComponents.description: Group of radio buttons allowing selection of a single option.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the radio group for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonSlides
BasicComponents.description: Slides component for creating a carousel of slides.

BasicComponents.name: IonSpinner
BasicComponents.description: Spinner component for displaying a loading indicator.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the spinner for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonToast
BasicComponents.description: Controller for displaying toast messages programmatically.

examples: const toast = await toastController.create({ message: 'Toast message', duration: 2000 }); await toast.present();

BasicComponents.name: IonBackdrop
BasicComponents.description: Component that covers the interface to provide a backdrop effect.

aria-hidden.description: Indicates whether the backdrop is visible or hidden for accessibility purposes.

BasicComponents.name: IonButtons
BasicComponents.description: Component for grouping multiple buttons together.

BasicComponents.name: IonPicker
BasicComponents.description: Component for selecting a value from a list of options.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the picker for accessibility purposes.

examples: const picker = await pickerController.create({ columns: [...], buttons: [...] }); await picker.present();

BasicComponents.name: IonPopover
BasicComponents.description: Component that displays a menu or content in a popover.

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the popover for accessibility purposes.

examples: const popover = await popoverController.create({ component: 'YourComponent', translucent: true }); await popover.present();

BasicComponents.name: IonRadioGroup
BasicComponents.description: Component that groups multiple radio buttons together.
